statements: UPDATE landmarks SET elevation = 500.75 WHERE landmark_id = 1
UPDATE landmarks SET date_built = '1995-10-15', landmark_description = 'Historic site with scenic views' WHERE landmark_name = 'Golden Gate Bridge'

UPDATE landmarks SET landmark_name = 'Eiffel Tower', landmark_description = 'Iconic iron lattice tower in Paris, France', latitude = 48.858372, longitude = 2.294481, elevation = 324.0, date_built = '1889-03-31' WHERE landmark_id = 1;

UPDATE landmarks SET latitude = 34.052235, longitude = -118.243683, elevation = 71.0, landmark_name = 'Hollywood Sign', date_built = '1923-07-13', landmark_description = 'Famous cultural icon and landmark in Los Angeles, California' WHERE landmark_id = 2;
UPDATE Landmarks SET year_built = 1850 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Tours SET start_time = '2022-12-01 09:00:00', end_time = '2022-12-01 15:30:00' WHERE tour_id = 3;
UPDATE Landmarks SET year_built = 2000, description = 'Renovated in 2021' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Tours SET start_time = '2023-08-15 10:00:00', duration = '2 hours', end_time = '2023-08-15 12:00:00' WHERE tour_id = 3;
UPDATE landmarks SET name = 'Golden Gate Bridge' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE users SET location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(-122.415571 37.774872)') WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE landmarks SET name = 'Statue of Liberty' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE tours SET landmarks_visited = ARRAY[1, 2, 3] WHERE tour_name = 'New York Tour';
UPDATE landmarks SET name = 'Eiffel Tower', description = 'Iconic iron lattice tower in Paris', year_built = 1889 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE tours SET description = 'Explore historical landmarks in Paris', duration = 3, name = 'Paris Landmarks Tour' WHERE id = '4baaff98-687c-4a56-9bfc-e09cfdf33b78';
UPDATE landmarks SET location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(-122.3301 47.6038)') WHERE id = '1ec20e54-3c49-4d02-a898-8ee8210553c8';
UPDATE categories SET description = 'This category includes historical places' WHERE id = 'f1e41778-159f-48f6-b57b-e92a8eec52b0';
UPDATE landmarks SET location_geog = 'POINT(-122.6544 45.5165)', date_established = '2021-01-15' WHERE landmark_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE tours SET end_location_geog = 'LINESTRING(-122.6544 45.5165, -122.6578 45.5171)', distance = 10.5 WHERE tour_id = '78901234-5678-9abc-def0-123456789abc';
UPDATE landmarks SET location_geog = ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(-122.349653 47.620466)'), information = 'Updated information' WHERE landmark_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE categories SET category_name = 'Historical', description = 'Updated category description' WHERE category_id = '456e89b7-e12d3-456a-8426-614174174000';
